messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Hey Holleigh I hope you slept well and you finish your assignments before your trip to Georgia :) I’ve been meaning to ask you this for a while, but I’ve been patient due to your past experiences 😬  but I’ll just come out and say it, would you ever consider dating me? I hope this doesn’t sound crazy, but it really feels like the Lord has been giving me signs to shoot my shot. I’ve been praying for months for the Lord find me a woman, and I was initially wanting to talk to you to see if we could be friends, but as I got to know you, you seem to be exactly what I’d imagine when I would pray. I wanted to ask you over text so you could take some time to respond :) Anyways if you want to stay friends, I’ll still watch Chosen and game with you but I just felt the need to say this haha, I hope I’m different than the guys always hitting you up in the DMs.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Hey Zac!! I slept SO well and I’ve finished almost all my assignments before heading to Georgia tomorrow! Praise the Lord! :D I hope today has been well for you also and you’ve gotten through your assignments!! That does not sound crazy at all, I really appreciate you taking the time to think and ask God and have patience to ask this! I know it’s so scary to communicate that and I’m so proud of you :) I would 100% date you! 😁 I’ve actually been praying and sitting on this for a while and talking to God about it for a while, and this just made my year!! 😁 I would of course want to meet you in person aswell ! But yes, I’d date you ! :D I’m literally sitting here smiling my face off 😂 from the time I’ve gotten to know you Zac you are such an awesome and amazing person, I’m truly thankful God placed you in my life when he did and I’m so glad I said yes to talking to you when you reached out again in January!!  You are 100% different than the creeps DM’ing me 😆 gah this has made my day

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I can finally say this without (maybe) seeming really weird 😂 I love your smile, it lights up my day and just to see it makes my whole world spin around. I love your laugh and your whole personality, I love getting to FaceTime you because I get to see you and it makes my whole entire year. You completely take over my thoughts all the time, I find myself constantly thinking about you. I find myself sometimes just staring and admiring you which I hope doesn’t sound creepy 😆 but how can I not admire Gods beautiful creation. Zac you are truly one of the best people I’ve had the honor of meeting. I talk to myself in my head all the time about how cute and handsome you are, I internally freak out when you send me a snap or we do get to talk face to face and I’m trying to be discreet😂 but yeah, I think you’re really great :) I love everything about you, flaws and all. Our flaws don’t define us, you are such a strong and amazing person and I’m truly honored you’ve chosen me to want to do life with and walk alongside . I thank God everyday for you, I talk to God about you every single day because I just can’t believe you took interest in me and want me. I still have some baggage I need to flesh out and something to tell you because I am serious about this, about us. I’m all in, I was all in from the day you confessed and I’ve been in since before then haha. I know we can and will make this work out, no matter the distance or times zones or whatever. I believe in us🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Hey! This might be a long message or it might not be, we shall see by how much I ramble and type 😆 Zac, from the time I met you to the time we’ve been able to spend together over the phone it has been truly wonderful. You have shown me since the very beginning your true personality and your true self, I admire that. I know in today’s day and age it’s so hard to be your true authentic self, especially when the world around you tries to mold and shape you into who THEY want you to be. You’ve been your true authentic self through it all, since the first time we talked way back last year of June, to this January when you first reached out and even took that risk to talk to me. Going into 2024, I never thought that I would find someone like you. I had been by myself and single for nearly 2 years and I was as contempt as I could be. I’ve been told this saying that I believe to this day, “love will find you when you least expect it” and I truthfully and wholeheartedly believe that. Love will find you when you’re not looking. Through these past few months getting to talk with you, get to know you better and just to hangout with you it has truly been a blessing. You are such a God fearing man, your passions shine through you when you talk about them. I admire your strength, your joy, your compassion and your humor you carry with you daily. I know we haven’t met in person, but from the glimpses I’ve been able to have from talking with you, you are truly a remarkable and God fearing man. You push me closer to the Lord, and help strengthen my relationship with God. That’s rare and special. Your fruits of the spirit peak through and I’ve seen them since the beginning. Little things that I noticed. The choice to trust and to choose me, someone who is across the country in a different state. That truly is a scary thing to do, but with you it feels so natural. You squashed any worries I had when we talked the other day, and I haven’t second guessed my decision to be committed to you since your confession ast month! Growing up love was never showed to me in a healthy way in my household. My parents relationship is strained and it’s never been a relationship showing Gods love he wants for spouses. So I’ve had a flawed view of it growing up. But, my bestfriends family has shown me what love looks like. Through my last relationship, we immediately said those 3 big words on day 1, so I never knew what it was like because my 14 year old brain said it from the beginning. I’ve slowly realized that love comes in different ways, in friendships, the daily tasks we do everyday, Gods love for us seen in everyday life. With all my rambling, this does have a point I promise. Zac you show love and care in the sweetest ways, when I first played minecraft with you, you grabbed flowers from a trip somewhere and it made my heart soar. Your subtle hints and comments when we’d call and just all these little things meant a ton to me, it showed me a different way of care. You show it in remembering the small things about me, you show it in the most subtle but noticeable ways. I might sound crazy, who knows, we haven’t met in person, and I’m terrified out of my mind but I’m trusting God in this through it all. You have taken over my every thought, you plague my thoughts every single day 24/7. The smallest of things reminds me of you, the sunsets I see at Auburn, the sky, so many other things I could ramble on for forever. You captivate my every thought every single day,. Your smile, your laugh, the sound of your voice, the way you smile when you talk about something your passionate about. I love your beautiful smile, it lights up any room and it always makes my day when I get to see it your breathtaking eyes, my favorite color. Your eyes blue like the sea, as the blue winter sky and the ocean in the spring. Flawless just like the sky, they are the most beautiful shade and it made me fall in love with the color even more. I could ramble on for hours- days even, probably months about everything I adore about you. To say all of this, I am scared to write this out. I’ve been thinking on this and making sure that this was right before I typed it out or brought this to you- because no matter what I’m not perfect, but I want you to know that I will stay committed to you for the rest of my life. I feel like you are truly an answered prayer, and I’d do it all over again if it means I get to meet you and go through this adventure with you :) anyways- I’ve sat on this for a bit, because I wanted to get everything in check before coming to you about it. I’m in love with you, all the signs are there for me and I can’t deny it any longer. God has been nudging me and giving me so many obvious signs. You consume my every thought, just seeing your message pop up on my phone sends a smile to my face, getting to hear your voice and just talk with you or just hang out on call is the highlight of my week. I have something written down in my notes, and it’s called “what’s a soulmate” and it describes a beautiful description, saying how it’s like a bestfriend but more. The one person who knows you better than anyone, who makes you a better person. You inspire me to be a better person. Someone who knew you, accepted you and believed in you before anyone else did or when no one would. You’ve taken me all, in my flaws and everything you’ve still pursued me and reassured me through everything. Writing this out stressed me to the max- I was actually writing this out before you called me a bit ago haha 😆 But yeah, I love you Zac :) man. That’s wild to say. I don’t know if it’s crazy of me to say that because again, never met you and we’ve only been talking for a few months, but you’re different. You make my heart beat out of my chest and you give me butterflies and make me feel seen, heard and valued. I thank God for you every single day. There hasn’t been a day I’ve second guessed this decision. There is still something I do need to tell you moving forward in this relationship that we are building, but I did want to get this out there :) 🩵🩵🩵 "Two are better than one, because they have a good return for their labor: If either of them falls down, one can help the other up. But pity anyone who falls and has no one to help them up. Also, if two lie down together, they will keep warm. But how can one keep warm alone? Though one may be overpowered, two can defend themselves. A cord of three strands is not quickly broken." ~ Ecclesiastes 4:9-12

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Holleigh, after all my previous relationship endeavors, I can surely say that talking to you have been an entirely different experience than what I have been used to. Being in a relationship to me has always been so shallow. I’ve always been stressed pretending to be someone I wasn’t, I said things like “I love you” just cause I thought that was what you were supposed to do. Every time the Bible talked about love, it just seemed so foreign to me because of my experiences.  I’ve tried to hide my interests just to appease the person I’d talk to, and they would always be attracted to me on the surface, such as just my body or the fact that I play hockey. For the first time I can say I’ve built this relationship on being myself, approaching you under my twitter account, my most repressed interest. I’m serious when I say this, if I didn’t talk to you, I would still be lost, pretending to be someone I’m not.   From talking to you, I can really say that I love you and mean it. It’s funny, from the start I’ve had a naive sense of trust when talking to you. Now I know it isn’t naive, you are genuinely trustworthy, we’ve connected on such a deep level that I can’t imagine talking to anyone else, and I feel like you feel the same way. It’s ironic that this we are so far from each other, but this is the most genuine relationship I’ve had by far. I’ve felt God nudging me towards you in so many obvious ways as well, and I can see why. You have also strengthened my faith deeply, I’ve had such an easier time following the word of God ever since meeting you. You remind me of the entirety of Proverbs 31, especially the value of a God fearing woman in verse 30, “Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the LORD, she shall be praised.” The best part is, I don’t have to worry about the beauty is vain part because you are beautiful :) Every time I see you smile, it’s so special to me. When you smile, your personality shines through it like nobody else. I’m blessed to be able to experience that personality every time I talk to you 🩵 From your instagram posts to even looking at you on FaceTime, I can’t stop smiling thinking about how pretty you are. I can’t look at any other woman the same after meeting you, and I don’t want to share my life with anyone else. I’m terribly sorry your parents haven’t been the perfect example of a relationship, but relieved to hear about your friend’s family. I’m happy to make the sacrifices to make sure our relationship is as healthy as it can be, and I’m ready to learn on the way, growing with every mistake. I know neither of us are perfect, but I know we can help each other in our flaws. I’m glad we’ve developed such a deep connection without ever seeing each other in person, I want to ensure you that I’m the same in person as I am online :) I’ve never felt more happy reading a message, thank you so much for spending the time writing it. I’ve got to get to sleep now, and I hope you have an excellent start to your Monday 🧡

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Morning!!🩵 I hope you slept well and got enough rest!! Happy Monday!! Let’s make today great!!! 😄 I was not expecting this when I woke up🥹 this is such a sweet and heartfelt message, and I am grinning like crazy re-reading it over and over to make sure I’m not dreaming or hallucinating. I talked to you because of WHO you are, not what you do or what you look like, even though those are +’s 😉 There’s a verse I’ve kept close to me when going into this, 1 Samual 16:7 “Do not look at his appearance or at the height of his stature, because I have rejected him. For the LORD sees not as man sees; for man looks at the outward appearance, but the LORD looks at the heart.” I don’t look for looks, job, wealth etc.. those are all earthly things that will fade, but your heart and personality will stay no matter what! Matthew 6:21 For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also. Your heart shows your personality and who you are the most. I’ve grown up thinking I had to look a certain way, have this have that etc.. when in reality, it’s not what I look like or have, it’s my heart. Your heart is so precious Zac, from every encounter I’ve had with you, you’ve shown compassion, humility, thoughtfulness, care, joy, and so so much more. I’m so glad you decided to message me on Twitter, who knew that single message would lead to this great adventure :) you don’t have to pretend around me, I can promise you I won’t ever judge you. No matter what mistakes people make, I always show love, we aren’t defined by our mistakes. I’ve also had a naive sense of trust with you, I’ve become more trustworthy in life but with you it’s been different, you’re different! Especially from my baggage that I carry, it’s been so easy to talk to you and trust you. Haha I know right!! I don’t think distance matters when God is involved, no matter the distance, if it’s Gods will it’ll happen. I’ve seen His hand throughout these past few months, and that’s not by mistake! 🥹 this is so precious. I’ve dreamed and strived to be a Proverbs 31 woman 😆 it’s been pushed so much on women that it’s kinda been on the back of my mind to be a certain way etc… but with you I don’t have to act different or to impress, I can just be myself :) thank youuuu🥰🥰🥰 Gah this makes my heart soar🥹 I’ve never heard this before and I’m gonna tear up haha💙 Yeah, my parents relationship has always been rough, but I’m glad God placed my friend in my life so I could learn what biblical love is on the side. In a way it made me question it and I had the opportunity to dive in and learn more about it, and I’ve learned so much. I actually know so much, I have books on relationships and I’ve even done papers on the topic in highschool. I also act as a relationship counselor to my friends haha, God has given me an interest and love for it,, and just realizing that someone feels the same way makes me so so happy. I know I was destined to have a partner some day and God has been blessing me these past few weeks and I just can’t believe it. Zac you truly are one of my greatest blessings to come out of 2024🩵 I’m ready to grow alongside you in our journey, no matter where it takes us :) I’m really glad we’ve developed the connection while never met, I think it holds a deeper foundation for us, some people rely on seeing their bf/gf daily and having that physical connection, but the strongest foundation is on the Lord. I can also ensure that I’m the same person I portray online aswell, I’m always my true authentic self no matter where I’m at or if it’s on social media :) Thank you for spending the time to write this out🩵 it made me smile getting to read though this :)) I hope you got enough rest and you’re ready to take on another day!! I thank God for you every day Zac🩵 thank you for choosing me :) it means the absolute world to me

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I hope you have such a blessed & great night tonight Zac!🩵 thank you for taking time out of your day to hang out with me! Even if it’s to do homework, play games etc….! I always love spending time with you :) 💙 thank you for choosing to spend that time with me,, I really appreciate it more than you’ll ever know! I’m really thankful for you. I probably say it all the time but I really really am, you’ve been a light and pushed me towards my relationship with Christ,, you’ve slowly been healing some of the broken parts of my heart and I want you to know how grateful I am for you. 🩵 I know it’s only been a few months but I feel at peace with you, I trust you so much and I’m so comfortable talking with you. I’m really glad God placed you into my life, I hope you have such an amazing and blessed night tonight! I can’t wait for the day I get to see you in person and give you the biggest hug ever :) 🩵 here’s to seeing you soon 💙💙 G’Night Zac

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Get some rest tonight Holleigh 🩵 No need to thank me, every day is a blessing and even more so when I get to spend time with you. I really want you to know that you are an amazing person, that you should never discount yourself. I’m glad you share your time with me, you are valuable and it’s an honor to be dating you 🥹 Knowing that I’m helping in your healing process encourages me, and I’ll do anything to maintain a healthy relationship to continue healing you ☺️ When I see the art you make and get to see your silly personally it makes me go wild that I get to have you in my life :) Looking at your card project and sunset scene today, it’s clear to me that you are making magic, no matter if you are working at Disney or not. Keep up the hard work, God will use you for great things. Colossians 3:23-24: “And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men; Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.” I’m going to check flight prices this weekend and plan a weekend to come out, cause every day I can’t hug you when hanging up on  FaceTime sucks 🧡🧡

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Morning🩵 this was so so sweet to wake up to Zac🥹 every day is a blessing and more the time I get to spend with you aswell, I always look forward to it! 🥹 I really appreciate you,, you have truly been helping me heal in more ways than one,, I still sometimes fight with my head but you squash every insecurity and doubt as soon as it surfaces, I don’t know how I got so lucky to gain you in my life!! I love making artwork for you, it’s a way to express my gratitude and thanks and adoration for you!🩵 I’ve never thought of it that way, that’s such a cool and new perspective to it!! I love that verse, I remember falling back on it at the beginning of my Design journey, I love that you lead me to Jesus and speak His words and truths 💙 EEEEE🥰 This gives me so much excitement and hope!! Everyday I’m not able to hug you sucks haha, but I know it’s all going to be that much more worth it when I get to see you in person🩵🩵 you are worth the distance. Always. I hope you got so much rest ! I pray coffee was d a nuisance 😆 I hope today is a great and productive day! I know Thursdays are busy, I pray the lord gives you strength and peace as you go throughout today, finding every opportunity to see his blessings and goodness all throughout your day!! Today is another great day, and you’re going to do so many amazing things!!🩵 “The Lord is my strength and my shield; in him my heart trusts, and I am helped; my heart exults, and with my song I give thanks to him.” Psalm 28:7

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I also wanted to check in about something, I know in the beginning when we both confessed to liking one another, I had mentioned that I wanted to meet you in person before we put a label on it, but honestly now I don’t really care about it. You’re the one whom my heart desires and adores, and I just wanted to ask if you wanted to wait until meeting to put a label on us or go ahead and do it! No matter what, just know that I’m yours no matter what :) there isn’t a doubt in my mind or a hinder in my decision to be with you Zac🩵 I just wanted to ask and see what you were thinking, this is a two person decision I feel like! If so what date would it be that we “got together” if not when we meet

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I definitely am :) I’ve been praying about it and talking to a God for a while now! I trust you completely, you haven’t given me any reason not to trust you. You’ve been open, communicative, friendly, caring, compassionate and through everything cheered me on and stood by my side. I have healed enough to go through with this, I am completely different than I was in January. I’ve learned so much, grown in my faith with the Lord and you’ve been helping me even if you don’t think you have been, but you’ve been a big help to me these past few months. Heck yeah, let’s call the date when the bracelet comes in!!! :D 💙 of course! I’ve been sitting on this for a bit, I was nervous to approach you about it but this eased all my worries. I couldn’t see myself with anyone else either Zac, I truly believe Gods brought us together 😄 I was also reminded of this verse last night, and I thought I’d share it! It’s a great verse to fall back on for us ”It was also called Mizpah, because he said, “May the Lord keep watch between you and me when we are away from each other.“ Genesis 31:49 NIV

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I’ve had this sketch sitting in my iPad for two years, I started it May 9th, 2022. I told myself after everything that this sketch was going to go to someone special one day, and I’ve waited to finish it for two years. I’ve come back to it to alter it a bit but always left the male character blank. Today, I decided to finish this piece. I haven’t drawn something like this since February for my Valentine’s Day artwork, but I decided it was time to finally finish this. What once was a blank canvas, now holds new meaning with new characters. Signifying a new chapter :) I’m glad that this piece has your character in it, I’m honored to be stepping into this next chapter of my life with you by my side Zac🩵 I also had these words written for this sketch, I re-visited the song and it explains everything I feel for you

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Hahaha Holleigh I’m at the gym right now and I can’t stop smiling, it’s hard to keep my composure when you send something like this!!!! 🥹💙 Seriously I’d love nothing more than to be the man in your life, knowing you’ve saved that spot for years and have decided to allow me to fill it warms my heart and soul. I’m excited to treat you right, unlike you’ve been treated in your previous relationship. I’d never thought I’d find someone like you, you are truly one of a kind and I don’t know what I’d do without you. What a beautiful piece you’ve drawn, and the song is so perfect for it. I see us in that piece, but I also see the Lord. He worked in you to draw it, and he will work in us to build a Godly relationship. I’m committed long term, and honestly work has been a drag lately and it was hard finding motivation to work hard, but with you in my life, I’ve got more motivation now than ever. I can’t wait to hug you in person 💙💙 and I want to work hard so that distance doesn’t have to be a factor and I can hug ya everyday :)

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Morning!! I hope you slept so well and got enough rest to take on today!! Happy Saturday!! Praise the Lord it’s the weekend!!😁 I just want to express how thankful I am for you Zac🩵 I was never expecting to find someone as gracious and loving and caring as you, but the Lord had other plans. I stumbled across this Bible verse the other day, and it immediately reminded me of you💙 “Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her to make her holy, cleansing her by the washing with water through the word, and to present her to himself as a radiant church, without stain or wrinkle or any other blemish, but holy and blameless. In this same way, husbands ought to love their wives as their own bodies. He who loves his wife loves himself. After all, no one ever hated their own body, but they feed and care for their body, just as Christ does the church— for we are members of his body. “For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and the two will become one flesh.” Ephesians 5:25-31 From the day I first met you up until now, you have shown the fruits of the spirit, loving, caring, humbling. Since stepping into this friendship that blossomed into something beautiful, you have always shown Gods love and His care towards me. You have had patience with me and shown me humility and humbleness throughout it all. I’m truly honored God decided to bring you into my life Zac!🩵 you have changed it for the better, I couldn’t imagine my life without you now! I’m really excited to see where God takes us heading forward💙 I’m so thankful for you, I’m so in love with you. All of you. I love your smile, it lights up any room, and it always brightens up my day no matter what, I love the sound of your voice, I love your laugh. I love your personality, it radiates joy and Christs’ love and His joy! I cannot wait to see you in 25 days🥰

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin!!🩵 I can’t wait🥰 I find myself admiring you on Facefime too and I just smile seeing you and your beautiful smile🥰 I love you so much too🥹 gah- this is so surreal in every lifetime I’d chose to be yours Zac💙 thank you aswell for being mine- it truly is so lovely getting to do life alongside you. I cannot wait to give you a big hug when I see you so so soon!!! Thank you!! I pray you got enough rest to take on today!! You’re going to do so great this week, Gods got us no matter what!!! “Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.” John 14:27

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Assuming you were asleep, or at least trying to get some sleep, which is good cause you always need it haha. I just want to reassure you, even though I’m sure you don’t need it, that I don’t ever want you to go through the stresses of life alone. 💙 I recently saw the verse Galatians 6:2, “Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ” and it reminded me of us. It might be hard because of the distance, but it really occurred to me that you’ve been going through life and some tough times alone. I want to reassure you that I’ll always be here to carry your burdens with you no matter how heavy they might be because I really do love you ☺️ Thank you for staying strong and being bold out there without me, I’m so proud of what you have accomplished, and I can just tell God is guiding you to accomplish so much more. I pray that you have a wonderful day tomorrow, and I’ll talk to you soon my love 🙃💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Talking about For King and Country - Seasons: Also wanted to send this song- as soon as fK&K released it, I knew it would be special in the future. I really adore this, it explains 1 Corinthians 13:4-8 and it embodies the most truest form of love,, love never fails. I saw a quote that said “the Bible says love never fails, so if it fails it wasn’t love” and it made me reflect on what love is and what it means. I have a ton of Devo’s on love and books about the subject. I was obsessed with it in Highschool cause I guess I never received it correctly,, but I’ve learned slowly overtime what true love is from the Bible and from friends etc… as soon as I heard this from their album it immediately became a favorite. This song embodies everything I feel for you- no matter what I’m here and I’ll love you through the seasons, no matter what we go through. 🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I’ve had conversations with both parents about you now- and they’ve both been super well :) I’m excited for you to meet them🩵 I hope your project is coming along well!! Remember to take breaks, drink water and eat dinner if you haven’t yet! You matter more than this project. I’m thankful for you, thank you for choosing me to do life with. I know we’re across the state from each other, and I really appreciate you and everything you’ve done and continue to do for me. I pray this project goes smoothly for you and you get a break this weekend ! I’m so proud of you and everything you’ve accomplished and will accomplish from this day forward!! God is going to use you to do amazing things Zac!! 💙💙 I love you, all of you. Thank you for being mine🥰 I’ll talk to you tomorrow my love🩵 John 14:27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Morning!🩵 happy Monday!!! It’s the start of the week! As you step into this final week of your semester, I pray the lord will guide you and your steps and actions throughout ! Your dedication, hard work and your persistency is paying off!! I’m so incredibly proud of you Zac! No matter what, you’re going to do and accomplish great things!! :) You’ve got this, I believe in you! I pray this week is one of peace, calmness and the Lord gives it to you and his spirit of Joy ! Finals week is often so rough and hard to find joy in, I pray you find it in the little things! I also wanted to show this piece of art I got for us!! I saw this scenery piece and knew our characters would be perfect in it!!! 🩵🩵 I’m so thankful for you :)

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin !!🩵 Happy Thursday!! We’re almost to the end of the week AND the weekend!!😁 I know today’s going to be a long day, I pray God gives you peace and joy as you go throughout the day!! There is so much joy in each day and I pray the Lord is able to make the most of it even in the little moments ! You are doing so many amazing things !!! I pray the Lord will guide your steps and shine His light and love through you today for everyone to encounter!!! You are a blessing to me and everyone that encounters you!💙💙 I’m so blessed to have you in my life and know you! You gave my life a brand new meaning and brought color into my life ! I’m truly honored I get to do life alongside you and with you🩵 I hope today is as amazing as you are!🥰 I love you and I’m so thankful for you, always!! Philippians 4:6-7 Don’t worry about anything; instead, pray about everything. Tell God what you need, and thank him for all he has done. Then you will experience God’s peace, which exceeds anything we can understand. His peace will guard your hearts and minds as you live in Christ Jesus.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin love! Happy FriYAY💙 yayyyyy!!!!😁 I’ve been waiting for it to release for a while now! As soon as I heard it it immediately reminded me of you🩵 I hope your game went well last night and you get great rest and enjoy sleeping in!! You deserve it!!! 🥹 This means so much to me Zac, I always appreciate your kind words!! I’m so honored to call you mine Zac, you truly embody everything in a Godly relationship and as a Godly boyfriend! I’m so excited to grow alongside you and in our relationship together!! Whatever comes, whether there’s distance or not I believe we will make it, Gods got us no matter what! Distance doesn’t matter because I have you. Knowing I can wake up every day and have you by my side is worth any miles between us🩵 I’m truly blessed to call you mine🥰

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Good evening love, I hope your night is going well :) I just wanted to say I’m thinking of you.🩵 how grateful and thankful for you I have been ever since you came into my life. Ever since that phone call in January, my life changed forever, for the better. These past few months have been nothing but blessed. Getting to know you and build this relationship has been wonderful, and nothing like I could have ever imagined. Some days I wake up wondering how I got so lucky to call you mine? How in the world out of everyone on this planet that you chose me. I find myself pondering how I got this lucky to have someone as wonderful and caring, loving and so kind in my life- how did I deserve to have you placed into my life? You are an answered prayer Zac. I don’t know if you know the extent to it- but you truthfully are. If little me knew I’d have you in my life she would freak out haha. I’d grown up watching Disney movies and hearing love stories wondering about the day I’d get someone like that- while God had other plans for a while, you have exceeded every vision and thought and everything I’ve read about love. You’ve shown me care, kindness, compassion, joy and so much more. You show it to me every day without fail. You have showed the fruits of the spirit countless times and have showed me patience. Your presence in my life brings me so much happiness, and I can’t imagine my days without you. You’re more important to me than you’ll ever know, and I want to make sure you feel loved and valued every single day. I thank the Lord every day for you, praise him for bringing you into my life and writing you into my story. I’m so incredibly happy to see you on Wednesday, to finally give you the biggest hug and to finally have you in my arms. I love you and I’m so happy I decided to answer your call in January :) I can’t wait to see all the Lord has in store for us🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I completely understand that, it’s scary typing that out and waiting a response ! Of course, no matter what you’re stuck with me 😁🩵 You are so deserving of love!!! You don’t have anything to apologize for, I’m glad and so proud you did. I really appreciate you more than you know. You’ve achieved so much despite everything you’ve been through and it really shows Gods faithfulness and His movement in your life! I can’t wait until tomorrow, I’ve been nonstop thinking about it today and it’s not gonna stop anytime soon- my mind has constantly been on you all day and I’m not complaining 😌 I can’t wait to finally hug you and just to see you in person. I’m so glad you could find time to come down, I’m thankful for you always🩵 I promise to love you no matter what, through the good, the bad and everything life throws at us. You’re worth it

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Night my love🩵 thank you for being vulnerable tonight with me, I loved getting to talk with you and talk about our future :) you don’t have anything to worry about okay? I love you. All of you, that doesn’t change no matter what. I’m excited to continue this relationship with you, I’m so happy you got to come down💙 I’m so incredibly thankful for you. You are an answered prayer. I’m madly in love with you and nothing will ever change that, I hope you’re able to get a good nights rest🩵 I’ll see you tomorrow 😘 I love you. I love you because you actually put effort into me. I love you because nobody has ever given me the love that you have given me and you are the only one that could ever love me this way. I love you because you always make me feel that I am worth something. I love you because you make me smile when I almost had forgotten how to. I love you because you have a huge and honest heart. I love you and every little detail about you. I love you because you are simply you🩵 I just wanted to take a moment to remind you of how incredibly special you are to me. Your presence in my life has brought an abundance of love, joy, and happiness that I never knew was possible. From the way your eyes sparkle when you smile, to the gentle touch of your hand in mine. Every moment spent with you feels like a dream come true. You have a way of making even the simplest of moments magical, and I am endlessly grateful to have you by my side.

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Goodnight :) This has been such a great weekend for me Holleigh and I know there are going to be even better coming up 🩵 I feel comfortable around you and normally it’s really hard for me to feel like that around anyone, but you are so special to me 🥰 I love and adore you so much, I can’t believe I found such a diamond hiding across the country in Alabama 🥹 It was great to meet your family, at least the good side of your family. I appreciate you opening up about your family’s issues to me, you are incredibly strong getting through that with everything you have accomplished. Get some rest tonight, I’d be happy to drive to the airport tomorrow, you’ve sacrificed so much for me to so far, it’s the least I could do. Feel free to bring your iPad if you want to draw or anything!!  💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I’m so thankful you were able to take a trip down here to meet my family and hang out🩵 I’m forever thankful for you Zac. You truly are an answered prayer, I thank God for you every single day. I’m so madly in love with you and everything about you. I can’t get you out of my head and I don’t think I will ever be able to. You are everything in a man I’ve prayed for, for so long. I’ve never felt this content and safe around someone and you feel like home :) I’m so lucky to have you by my side and do life with, I’ll forever cherish the memories we made on this trip and the ones to come!!! I’m truly grateful to be in love with someone who makes saying “see you later” so hard. I know it was God that brought us together from the start, to fall in love with your personality before ever meeting or anything else. I’m living one of my answered prayers right now and I couldn’t be more grateful. I’m literally obsessed with you, loyalty isn’t something you gotta ask for. I only see myself with you, I wouldn’t waste that for anyone on this planet. You are the brightest star in my sky✨💙🌌 I love you and I can’t wait for what God has in store for us :) loving you is worth the distance. Love knows no distance, I’m so proud of you and forever thankful for you my love🩵

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: HOLLEIGH I LOVE IT 🩵🩵🩵 THANK YOU SO MUCH YOU ARE THE BEST 🥰 Every time I see our sonas together it makes my day :) It really feels like they are us and I can’t get that out of my head 🙃 It’s also so accurate cause I would not step in that river 😭 All of the art you’ve gotten me and especially drawn shows how compassionate you are, you are so precious to me Holleigh, I feel so warm inside knowing that I get to have you 💙 You are the woman of my dreams, and I’m still just star-stuck every day that I wake up and get to talk to you. You are beautiful inside and out, head to toe, I’m so proud of you for getting to here in your life. Your light shines the brightest around others and I’m blessed to see it so much in my life. It’s taking everything within me to stop myself from running to Alabama to be with you. I want to kiss and hug you everyday, make you breakfast, lunch, and dinner, make sure nobody ever hurts you again. I want to buy you all the art supplies you ever dream of so you can use your God given talent to the max. I have an itch that only you can scratch and I thank God every day for you 🩵🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Oh my goodness this message has me GRINNING from ear to ear🥰 I can’t get this smile off my face🥹 I love getting Giftart of our sonas!!! That’s so true you wouldn’t 😂 I chose well haha!! Gah how in the world did I ever get so lucky to call you mine🩵 you’ve shown me love that is gentle, compassionate, caring and Godly. It takes everything in me not to fly to Arizona every day, I can’t imagine my life without you. Ever since you came into my life you’ve changed it for the better. I can’t wait for the day where we will be by each others sides for good and distance won’t be a factor we have to worry about💙 Your words truly mean the absolute world to me🥹 really feeding into my love language right now haha! I’m truly so very blessed and so thankful God gave me you Zac!! You have showed me what true love looks like, you are such a hard worker and you are accomplishing SO much ! I’m so proud to call you mine and get to experience your walk through life and all your achievements 🩵 I thank the Lord every waking moment for you, you truly are a blessing. The best blessing to come out of this year🥰🩵 I can’t wait to have you in my arms again, kiss you, just be with you and make many more memories and go on many more adventures!! You’re my greatest adventure 💙 as long as I’m with you, I’m home :) I’ve heard relationships don’t complete you, they add on to you and you’ve certainly added on to my life in the BEST way🩵 how lucky I am to have you in my life🥰 I love you so much, past the stars in the galaxy, to the moon and back a million times, loving you is an ocean and I can’t hold back 🌊 You’re my greatest blessing, I’m so thankful for you my love! I love you and adore you, always

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: If all else fails Holleigh, I’ll stay by your side no matter what 🩵 I understand I’m madly in love with you right now and my brain is screaming at me that you are the most perfect woman on the Earth, but when the honeymoon phase is over I promise to stick with you. I’m so emotionally attached to you, it’s deeper than my addiction to you. I promise to be the man you deserve in your life 🙃 You make me feel so loved all the time it’s truly incredible, you are doing a great job and you are teaching me many things about what a healthy Christian relationship is supposed to be like. I’m sorry that I’ve been busy lately with work and this online class I’m doing, but it’s for the best so that we can have a bright future. Loving each other long distance is going to require some big things out of both of us, but we’ve got this. You’re gonna have to stay strong and independent when I’m not around, and I know you can do this because I know your story and what you have pushed through. Surround yourself with more and more Christian friends, and be a guiding light for Sigma Phi Lambda. I know there’s going to be more Holleigh’s out there that need their Lauren, you’ve grown so much into a social butterfly I know you’ll make an impact on many others 😊 I know earlier I said no more character development, but I lied, you’ve got a whole campus, circle of friends, and family to share your love with and change lives. It won’t always be easy, but take advantage of the good direction life has turned for us and share the joy with others! You are already rubbing off on me in so many ways, I’m looking to join a small group at my church, I’m gathering all of my friends birthdays to give them gifts, and I’m going to send Lauren a nice message Friday in preparation for you coming to hang with her. I’ll keep you in my prayers always and will be there for when you need to lean on me. I know you will do great, your kindness reflects the love and compassion you carry in your heart, your wisdom on things like relationships and life’s troubles is valuable to others, you have a nurturing spirit, you are a woman of virtue and integrity, and very humble, sometimes too much!! Sometimes your eating habits scare me, I want you to get the nutrients you need to stay healthy for our whole life together, I don’t want to be demanding or anything but don’t forget to care for yourself, your body will love you for it, kay? 🩵 As I write this I look over to the lamb on my drawer next to my bed and I think about yours and everything it’s seen and been through. It’s starting to make me emotional again, but from here on out we will share the burdens of life. I choose to love you 😘 Song of Solomon 8:6-7 (KJV): “Set me as a seal upon thine heart, as a seal upon thine arm: for love is strong as death; jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire, which hath a most vehement flame. Many waters cannot quench love, neither can the floods drown it: if a man would give all the substance of his house for love, it would utterly be contemned.”

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: I pray you’ve slept well Holleigh, I’ll probably be sleeping in cause it’s late. Have fun at the soccer game and enjoy the valuable time with Lauren, I know she appreciates every minute with you, I know I’m jealous she gets to be with you right now 🙃🩵 God has been so good to me putting you in my life, I swear I go to sleep with a smile on my face every night. You show your love for me and those around you in so many ways. I still can’t stop looking at all the art you’ve given me, the lamb on my table, the beautiful texts you send me, and thinking of the days we spent together 🥰 You mentioned earlier that all you want to do is draw pretty pictures instead of working an office job. I’m here to tell you your pretty pictures are more than pretty, they are unique, soulful, vibrant, and most of all magic 😌 The whole world needs to see your art!! Anyways, have a great day with Lauren today, try not to think about me all day, I know I won’t be able to stop myself from thinking about you 😘

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: My love for you is like an endless ocean, it goes beyond what the eyes can see and what words can express. There hasn’t been a day that I stopped wanting you and you haven’t gotten out of my head at all since I first met you🩵 in your arms, I have discovered a peace that I never knew existed. Your laughter is a melody that echos in my soul, bringing joy to even my darkest days. With every beat of your heart, I feel more connected to you, as if our souls were destined to dance together. You are not just my love, you mean everything to me. I love you for all that you are, all that you have been, and all that you will be💙 You are the embodiment of everything I’ve dreamed of and prayed for, and being with you feels like home. Your presence fills my heart with happiness, your touch ignites my soul with passion and your love envelopes me in a warm embrace that comforts and reassures me in the darkest of times. You are my confidant, my bestfriend and my partner in crime. I am grateful everyday for the gift of your love. Together, we can conquer any obstacle,  weather any storm and overcome any challenge that life throws our way. With you by my side, we can conquer anything. “I found the one my heart loves” Song of Solomon 3:4 💙 “I thank my God whenever I remember you” Philippians 1:3 “Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.” 1 Corinthians 13:4

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: What a treat this has been to read 🤍 it’s so reassuring to hear something so beautiful come straight from your soul :) You are my sanctuary from the chaos of the world around me, someone I can look forward to fill my love tank when it needs it the most. You are the other half I have been missing my whole life. You are the most precious thing, from your smile when you pick up my FaceTime calls to when I can tell your heart is about to beat out of your chest at even my small compliments. You are the dream I dared not dream because it seemed to perfect to ever come true. Your love is the blanket that keeps me warm inside and out, your touch the spark of divine passion. I’m endlessly grateful for you and the unshakeable bond we share. I listened to Long Haul a few times now, it’s not only a great song, but the lyrics resonate with me. I’m in it for the long haul, my heart is fixed. Thanks for adding another song to the soundtrack of our love story 😘 I pray you get rest tonight, I know I’m sleeping in for sure!! Conquer the day tomorrow, and I love youuu :) And don’t tell Lauren you called me your best friend!!!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love🩵 pray you’ve rested well, and slept in !! I hope your hockey skate went well !!! This was beautiful to wake up to🥹 it made my day 100% better. I never knew dreams could become a reality until God gave me you. Out of all the prayers I’ve prayed, your heavens answer💙 You’ve shown me that true, Godly love exists,, I gave up on finding it, but God knew what He was doing all along. I had to give up on it for Him to give me the most precious and amazing man. You have defied all odds and have reshaped my way of what love looks like, you embody Christ’s’ love and biblical love to a T. You’ve shown me that love knows no distance, even miles apart and I feel more connected to you than I ever have with anyone else. I know God was and still is, in the middle and the foundation for this relationship. Like the song Long Haul, I’m in it for life! I choose to love you till we’re old and grey lord willing🩵 you are the one I want to wake up to every morning, you are the one I want to build a future with, you are the one whom I wanna grow old with💙 I’m so incredibly blessed and amazed that God gave me something so precious and nothing like I’ve ever known. You truly are a miracle from God. I love you so so much, always and forever 🥰 I can’t wait to see how God writes our story and all the amazing things to come in the future ! I’m excited for the future with you,, no matter what life throws our way, I know I can conquer anything with God and you by my side🥰🥰🩵 I love you, take on the day today with Joy and positivity! It’s the weekend !🥳 Hahahaha I won’t 😂 you really are my bestest friend tho :))

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my handsome man🩵 your love is the sunshine that warms my soul each and every day☀️ I hope you slept well and are ready to take on the day!! Forever thankful for you and this life we get to do together :) The day I met you I began to forget a life without you. I feel so lucky to have stumbled upon someone as special as you, God really knew what He was doing all those years ago :) in every lifetime, I’d chose you. You are my blessing, my miracle, my love, my darling, my bestfriend🩵 I know the Lord has great things in store for us, I can’t wait to take on this life together. I hope today is as wonderful as you are my dear, go out and be the light I know you to be!

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Thanks for the message 🩵🩵🩵 I seriously cannot stop smiling all the hours of the day. You are my soulmate, the one who I’m destined to do life with. You are the woman of my dreams, and life feels like a dream with you in it, I hope I never wake up!! It’s a blessing every day I get to wake up and spend the day loving you. You are capable of doing everything you set your mind to and more! I’m so proud of you, and I’m proud to call myself your man. You are precious, gorgeous, loving, caring, strong, sweet, and everything in between. Let God work through you today and do everything for Him 🥰

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: You are genuinely the most loving person I have ever met 😭😭 I’ll never stop giving you the love you deserve and more!! 🩵 I’m glad we got to talk even if it was for a brief amount of time. I cherish every second spent with you and my heart skips a beat thinking about all the time in the future we are going to spend together. I can’t imagine a better person to share life with and I’m smiling cheek to cheek while writing this :) I had a good time with my family and have been catching up with one of my friends that we played with. Praying you get some rest tonight, and you have a wonderful morning tomorrow 🥰

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin love🩵 gah you are the sweetest ever😭 you’re the most loving person I’ve met, uno reverse😎 I’m so glad we got to talk aswell! No matter how much time, I always enjoy it and savor the moments we get to talk!! I couldn’t imagine myself with anyone else, I do hope we get to spend together forever 🥰 the Lord was so gracious when He gave me you, I never knew a love like this existed, and you’ve shown me that it is out there. And I’m lucky enough to call you mine💙 So so glad you had a wonderful time with your family!! I know fellowship with others is so important as is family time! Thank you!! I pray you got enough rest to take on today!! You’re going to do amazing things :) you’re working so hard and it’s all going to pay off!! I’m so incredibly proud of you🩵 I love you and adore you, always

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: 🥰 G’Mornin my handsome man, I hope you slept well last night! Thank you for being mine, it’s such an honor to be loved by you and to be able to take on life alongside you! I never knew a love like this existed until God placed you into my life🩵 You have shown me a love that’s gentle, caring, honest and most of all, biblical. I think of 1 Corinthians 13:4-8 everytime I think of us and you. You love with intentionality and you choose to, which is beautiful. I’m so honored God decided to place us together, I promise to love you always, you are my rock, my person, my bestfriend, my lover. I love you always🩵 I pray today is as wonderful and magical as you are!! Take time to relax and rest today, you deserve it!!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my handsome man🩵 This was the best to wake up to, I definitely will have a smile all day😁 I always enjoy drawing for you!! It’s one of the things I enjoy most, and to see your smile is a reminder of why I do it! You are deserving of love and so much, I’ll spend the rest of my life giving you the love you deserve and spoiling you 💙 I’m so blessed God wrote our stories intertwined,, you are the BEST thing to come out of 2024!! You are what I’ve been praying for, for all these years. And to know the Lord has granted my prayer is everything to me. You mean everything to me. I promise to love you with all that I have, you are one of my biggest blessings Zac🩵 I can’t wait to see what God has in store for us, and the blessings and adventures we will get to take on in the future !! I love you 💙 I hope today is as amazing as you are!!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin love!!🩵 Happy Tuesday !! I hope you slept well last night !! I’m so glad I got to talk with you yesterday ! You always brighten up my day :) my sunshine on a cloudy day☀️ I pray you got enough rest and you’re ready to take on today!! I’m so blessed God gave me you. You’re my first, and I don’t mean my first kiss, or my first relationship, or my first I love you. You’re the first person who makes me feel like I’m enough, and the first one to show me what I love you actually means. Thank you for showing me what love is and means, thank you for giving me the love I’ve always dreamed about since a kid. Gods love is unconditional, and now I get a taste of what His love is through you. You have shown me a care, compassion and adoration I never knew existed. Your love is quiet, in the whisper of your words, in the touch of your hand, in the gentleness of your smile, in the kindness of your eyes and the joy of your laugh. I love the way you love me Zac. I’ll continue the rest of my life loving you, striving to biblically love you and stand by your side and be there for you no matter what. It’s us against the world, no matter what trials come at us, you’ll always have me to lean on in times of trouble or rough days. I love you so infinitely, my love for you is as the grains of sand on every beach🩵💙 I’m truly blessed to call you mine, and always remember. My prayers hold you when my arms cannot Mark 10:9: Therefore what God has joined together, let no one separate.

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Thanks for this wonderful message to wake up to 🥹🩵 When we first explored the idea of dating each other and I said I date to marry, there hasn’t been a second where I’ve doubted my intentions otherwise. You’ve been the light in my life, and I feel closer to God than ever. I only dreamed of you, never knowing that you were real. I treasure each message I receive from you and it keeps me going day to day. Knowing I have your prayers to hold me gives me strength to keep working hard daily. We are a team, you and I, till the end. I’ll love you every second of the way. Can’t wait to talk to you again today, it’s all I think about. 10 more days 🩵🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: 🥰🥰 G’Mornin love ! Happy Wednesday!!! 2 days away from finally having you in my arms!! My answered prayer, my bestfriend, my lover, my partner in crime, my person. I thank God for you every single day I wake, since He placed you in my life, it has been nothing but sweet. He was so gracious in giving me you, you’ve changed my life for the better. Showed me what a Godly man and what Godly love is like. When I told you about my past, you didn’t run. You didn’t change me, you didn’t think I needed changing. I will forever praise the Lord for seeing me fit for you. You are the epitome of Godly love, patience, joy, care, humbleness and much more. Thank you for choosing me out of all the billions of people in the world. I love you more than the stars in the sky, I pray today is as amazing as you are!!!🩵💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Made it to the gate, waiting to board :) Good morning love 🩵 I pray you got some rest, hoping to not see a good morning text until later so I know you’ve slept in ☺️ I hope your day up until you see me later goes fantastic, but I’ll make sure the rest of the day goes great for us :) You are my dream woman, a true woman of virtue, and I’m blessed to be able to hold you in my arms today. It’s truly bizarre that we are both on this planet only born 11 months apart, God really created us for each other 🥹🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I’m so thankful for you and everything you’ve done for me and continue to do🩵 You are such a blessing to my life. God knew my heart needed you. In you, I have finally found all I never dared dream I could deserve or have- the kind of love that is rare. Being known in a way that touches the deepest parts of me. Accepted in a way that blows my mind. In you, the love I have always desired to give now has a place to call home. I have been a skeptic, but you are my undeniable miracle. The questions don’t matter anymore. We have finally found each other, and that is enough💙 You are the end of my road. After a lifetime of missed exits and wrong turns, you feel like I’m finally home. One journey ends, and another begins with you🩵 You are all I ever wanted love to be. I love all of you, even the parts you think are not worthy of love. You’re worth every mile between us. Always remember, my heart holds you when my arms cannot🩵💙 I love you always and forever my lover "It was also called Mizpah (watchtower), because he said, "May the LORD keep watch between you and me when we are away from each other." -Genesis 31:49

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my love 🩵 I pray you get rest this morning and are blessed to sleep in. I adore reading that text, and I adore you 🥰 It’s only been a day, but I miss you dearly. The short trip so far has me wanting more than anything to hug you tight again. I love being able to talk all about you in front of extended family, and I sit there and smile for minutes after you are brought up. I wore the shirt you gifted me yesterday with pride knowing that I’ve got a one of kind woman who’s got everything I’ve ever desired. I went through all our pictures and art you’ve given me this morning, just reminiscing about you, and I’m still in awe of your beauty inside and out. I still remember and cherish the “at least I’m holding onto you” piece story, that you’ve been waiting to finish that piece when that special someone steps into your life. My heart burns with passion and love for you, only 22 more days until I see you love 🥹🩵

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning, my love 🩵 I hope you are ready to face the day with the strength and joy that God provides. I thank the Lord every day for blessing me with you. Even though we are miles apart, my heart feels your presence close. A verse from a devotional I read today, know that I’m not alone in loving you, God’s love and faithfulness is present forever and always, and I strive my best to keep that promise to you too 🥰🩵 “The LORD hath appeared of old unto me, saying, Yea, I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.” (Jeremiah 31:3) May your day be filled with His peace and grace. I love you deeply and can’t wait to be together again 🙃

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my love, I bet you look cute while sleeping right now 🙃 I’m so grateful for you and I’m excited to get up every morning because I’ve got my soulmate, I feel complete. Your compassion and faithfulness inspires me and I’m incredibly proud of the woman you are 🩵 Here’s a Psalm to remind us of one of God’s promises “This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.” (Psalm 118:24) May God’s blessings and joy fill your heart today. I love you and miss you more than words can say ( ^ω^ ) 💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I’m so thankful for you Zac🩵 I mean it every time I say it, I am in awe of you and just so so thankful for you and all you do for me. I never knew a love like this existed until you came along. It’s so hard being away from you but I’m so insanely lucky to have someone that makes being away so hard💙🩵 You are my dream come true, my answered prayer. Someone I didn’t know I needed until you came into my life. You’ve shown me a gentle and quiet love, a Godly love. You’ve shown me that love doesn’t have to be this grand thing, but love can be in the little things and quiet moments. I love you for all that you are, all that you’ve been, and all that you’re going to be🩵 I can’t wait for the day we tackle the distance and won’t have to say goodbye, only goodnight. I love you and only you, I have found the one whom my heart desires and it’s you. In every lifetime it’s you. I love you with everything I have🩵 I’ll continue to shower you with love and affection until I’m 6 feet under. I love you, the love of my life, my soulmate, my person, my future husband💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: You are the person I have longed for all my life, a divine gift from God Himself. What we share is a truly beautiful and extraordinary bond. We are destined to be the couple everyone looks up to, a testament to love’s enduring strength. It won’t always be easy, but I have never shied away from a challenge, especially one so worthwhile. You have complemented me in ways I never imagined, transforming my life into something profoundly wonderful. It is your unwavering love and support that have made this possible. Every little act of love from you is noticed and cherished, more than words can express. From the bottom of my heart, thank you, my love. And thank God for us; all glory to Him. You said it best: the pain of separation stems from our unbreakable bond, a bond that distance can strain but never sever. This hurdle, we will overcome, no matter what. I promise to stay by your side, to bring out the best in each other until the very end. I love you with every fiber of my being. Yours forever 🩵

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love🩵 this was truly beautiful to read this morning!! You’re the man I’ve prayed for since I was little, and to see God granted me my prayer, everything leading up to you is worth it. Distance won’t ever be a factor too difficult to overcome, you are worth the miles between us. You have definitely complimented me in more ways than one. In ways I never knew could be possible. Your intentionally is shown through so many aspects in this relationship. I’ve never experienced love like this, and you’ve completely changed my view of it for the better. I thank God for you every waking moment, not able to comprehend that He gave me you. Distance isn’t forever, I have faith in Gods plan. We were brought together for a reason. Even though it’s tough and it hurts sometimes, it’s all going to be worth it in the long run. The distance is temporary, a love like this is rare. I’d spend the rest of my life in long distance if it meant one day I’d get to be by your side. I promise to stay by your side through it all. The ups, the downs, good, bad. No matter what life throws at us. I am committed to you 110%. I see my future with you by my side, only you as my partner and soulmate. I’m yours, only yours 🩵 I hope you have a wonderful day today, I pray you slept well and you have a great service this morning and a wonderful picnic with your family this afternoon !! I love you so much💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Woke up early and I got you living in my mind right now, so I might as well say good morning 🩵 I wanted to say I’m so thankful to have you in my life. I’ve been meeting with cousins and their significant others on this trip and I’ve just love yapping all about you to them, even talking about our future when the conversation permits it. It’s been so great, and on the Lord’s day today I thank him and appreciate all he has blessed us with in life, specifically our relationship. I also really want to thank you, the sun that lights up my soul, for being so kind and affectionate to me, I’ll forever repay the favor because you deserve it. In your dark, soulful eyes, I see my whole world and more. Thanks love, have a blessed Sunday filled with rest and God’s peace and reassurance. Enjoy the beach trip, I look forward to seeing pics of it 🌹🩵 I’m going to try to head back to bed and get more rest, love you!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: I love you so much🩵 I don’t ever think I’ll be able to express the words of how much I love and adore you , but I’ll spend the rest of my life trying to find them. You are my love, my heart, my light. You bring a smile to my face all the time, I see you in the ocean and the sunsets. My face lights up when I see your name pop up on my screen. You make me so happy, I’m truly in awe of you and so blessed God gave me you🥰💙 I love you with all that I have, always and forever my love

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: HI MY HANDSOME MAN🩵🩵🩵 It’s OFFICIALLY 12 AM where I’m at- so it’s been 3 MONTHS WITH THE LOVE OF MY LIFE🥰 My person, my soulmate, my lover, my future husband !!!!! I’ve known you for 6 months, loved you for 3🥰💙 Zac, it has been such an honor to get to love you these past 3 months. You are the epitome of a Godly man. You have all the characteristics and attributes of a Godly man, and everything and even more that I’ve been praying for since I was a little girl. You are so compassionate, intentional and caring when it comes to me. You aren’t afraid to be obsessed and loving with me in public in front of others. You love me so well. You are a dream come true my love. It feels like I’ve known you way longer than 6 months!!! I’ve always seen this quote going around, and now I understand it completely. “Love someone who makes you love Jesus more” Zac you embody Jesus’ love for me and to me. You truly are a work of art. Words won’t ever be able to express how much you mean to me. These past few months with you have been unforgettable. I’ve enjoyed each and every moment with you. Whether that be over the phone, in person etc. every day with you as an adventure, our adventure. Loving you is the greatest adventure.🩵 I cannot wait to see where God brings us and what He does for us! You are my answered prayer, my lover, my future husband, my everything 🥰 I love you to the moon and back and past the stars my love!!! Happy 3 months!! We have forever to go! 🤍

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: During my hockey game tonight, I knew I was going to be blessed with a lovely 3 months message, because that’s the thoughtful, dedicated, and loving person you are. I couldn’t help but smile on the ice and on the bench. What I didn’t expect was another stunning piece of art. You never cease to amaze me my love, the fact that you found time to draw this delightful piece while at Myrtle Beach made yell in surprise when I opened my phone in the car. The daisies all over such a heavenly scene. The lighting on our sonas bodies and hair. The flowers I wish I could pick for you in my sona’s maw. The rolling hills and their content expressions, I’m sure they feel at home. Thanks for the songs to listen to on the ride back too, I had a smile plastered on my face. Holleigh thinking back on this year, it feels so it’s been so much longer than it has. We’ve grown so close together at an incredible pace, I’m so proud of us, we’ve gotten through some difficult conversation and came out even closer due to it. I have an unwavering trust and respect for you, I will never back down from a difficult conversation, we’ve shown to flourish past anything like that. You’ve taught me how to love, I didn’t think it would come so fast, but I’m ready to go where it takes me. I’m ready to marry you, I promise. I know it will happen. I big part of my anxiety getting into relationships was that my partner would desert me when times get hard, it was hard to put myself in someone else’s hands so that they could have the power to throw me away. With you I see my whole life, your perseverance shines bright and it encourages me. I know you’d never leave me, and I will never leave you. God has given me the most precious woman I can ask for and now I get to enjoy life with her, how unbelievable is that? I cannot wait to put a ring on your finger. I love you endlessly and I’m thankful for you more than I could ever say. God’s response to my prayers last year has never been clearer. You’re the answer my wife 🌹

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Night my love!! I love you so so much!!! Sleep whale and sweet dreams !!!🩵 I am so deeply INLOVE with you🥰 I said “I love you” but what I meant was - I’ve never felt so much peace with another person. I can rest my mind and speak my heart for the first time without feeling judged or unwanted. I feel safe with you. I feel known. And for the first time I understand what real love is. You were the first person I felt both wildly unsure and unwaveringly certain of. That was the scariest part about falling for you; the fact I had no idea what I was doing, but at the same time, I knew exactly why I had to. You are the proof God answers prayers🩵 it felt easy, like God had put the two of us together deliberately. I love you my handsome man, I can’t wait to talk to you and hear all about your trip!!!💙💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!🩵 I hope you slept well and you’re well rested for today!! Happy Monday !! Only 2 MORE DAYS until I get to see you!!!!🥰 I am truly so blessed beyond measure. You are my answered prayer in so many ways love. In you, I have finally found all I ever never dare dream I could deserve or have- the kind of love that is rare. Being known in a way that touches the deepest parts of me. Accepted in a way that blows my mind. In you, the love I have always desired to give now has a place to call home. I have been a skeptic, but you are my undeniable miracle. I am yours, the way the sea belongs to the moon, the way the moon belongs to the sky, and even if jealous stars break and shatter upon the Milky Way, I will still see heaven in your eyes🤍 It’s an honor to love you and to be loved by you Zac. Here’s to forever🩵💙 I love you so much

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my gorgeous princess of a wife 🩵 It was a little bit of a rough sleep without you by my side, but I’m blessed to be able to sleep in. I pray you’ve had a good night’s rest and you are ready to take on what the Lord has in store for you today. It was a pleasure to read your text as I get up today, such beautifully written words of romantic encouragement, I appreciate you so much. I’m floored that you are real, that I get to be your person, that I can love you forever, and just enjoy being with my best friend at the same time. Your beauty shines through all of your features, your sweet smile, your smooth skin, your deep tan which I’m ecstatic to see in person, your adorable giggle. I’ve fallen in love with your soothing southern voice, just hearing you talk warms my soul, your dark eyes which I get lost in and cannot wait to gaze into in two days. Even without painted nails, styled hair, and makeup, you are the only one I ever desire, but I see and appreciate any effort to make you glow even more, it’s like icing on top of a cake. I love you for who you are and I always will. Don’t change for anyone, I love you dearly 🩵 Thanks for being my wife 🌹

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: This made my DAY my love🥰🩵 I’ve read this about 10 times now🥹 I’m so blessed by the lord that He gave me you Zac. You are my everything, my answered prayer, the one I want to spend the rest of my life with forever. I love you always and forever my future husband🥰🩵💙 I can’t wait for forever with you!!!!! I’m so in awe of you, and your fire for the lord and your love and adoration for me. Never in my life did I know I’d find my dream person, and God graciously put you in my life. Words won’t ever be able to express how much love I have for you. I love you so much, always and forever

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!!🩵 I hope you’ve slept well and you’re ready to take on today!! Happy Tuesday!! Only ONE MORE DAY!!!!! 💙💙💙 I pray today is as great as you are and you are productive and successful in all you do today!! The Lord is always beside you and guiding you! Remember to lean on him. He is so good and so gracious to us !! Praise him for allowing us to wake up this morning! I’m so proud of you. You are achieving so much and you are doing so many amazing things and are going to do amazing things and change the world in the future !! It’s an honor to love you and stand by your side. I will forever cheer you on and support you in your dreams. Achievements and your goals. You can do anything with God by your side ! I love you so much my love!! Only a few more hours till I get to hug you!!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my handsome lover🩵 I hope you slept super well last night and were able to catch up on rest!! I pray today is as amazing as you are!! Happy Tuesday!! I love you so much Zac, I knew you loved me when I could feel it in the way you listened, in the way you remembered the “just because” gestures. You accepted every corner of my life, even the parts that collect dust. I knew you loved me when you showed me how far you would go, you sat next to me patiently as I unraveled and rebuilt who I wanted to be. I knew you loved me when I realized that I had never been seen before. There was no n facade of expectation. You intertwined your life in between my lines. This was lightweight. This was we will figure it out together. This is home, but in a person. I knew you loved me, because I never have to wonder if you did. Your love is kind, gentle and pure. And it lingers on the small wounds and scars that have tainted my heart, I realize just how much I have endured to finally be healed and loved by someone like you💙  I want to make up for all the love you never thought you deserved. You are my answered prayer, each day is a gift, a reminder of the Lords goodness and faithfulness. I love you with my whole heart Zechariah Christopher Yurkanin. You are the only one for me. I’m yours as you are mine. Gods plans for us will be a beautiful love story🤍 I can’t wait to see how it turns out

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Thanks so much for this text to wake up to ☺️ I appreciate the effort you put into it so much, it’s so beautifully written and packed with love 🩵 It means the world to me that you’ve been able to open up to me and put your trust in me relatively quickly. You’ve healed faster than I’ve ever anticipated, at first I didn’t understand how deep the scars were, but knowing what I know now I’m surprised you gave me a chance, a stranger living in Arizona. Over five years of that and we are just over 3 months together. I knew before I even talked to you that you were special from what you posted on twitter. Not just the art, which signifies dedication and passion and reflects God’s glory through beauty. The God fearing part of you shined and shines so bright. And that was all before I had even met you, you are the sweetest, most thoughtful, loving, compassionate, and strong woman I could have ever wished for. I would have never thought you hadn’t been treated with decency in the past. You are deserving of abundant and profound love, and I promise you I will spend the rest of my life giving it to you. Let’s live our romance movie forever 🩵 I love you 🥰

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my love 🩵 happy national girlfriend day to the woman of my dreams 🥰 You are the only person I ever desire to marry and I can wait to be able to celebrate national wife day 🙃 I pray you got good enough sleep to make it through the day as you start heading to your cruise, and that your family enjoys a time of tranquility on the ocean without quarreling. I’m so thankful to spend life with such a beautiful woman inside and out. I love you more than anything, second to the Lord 💙🌹 I miss you dearly, especially after I dreamed about you last night. There was us and two friends, on guy and one girl. The girl friend was a furry artist and everyone wanted to date her cause she’s single. You both counted up your dog/wolf drawings to see who drew more of them and you won. Our guy friend was moving into a new house and I asked him when we could come over and have dinner, he said February 11th, but that is my brothers birthday, and I think you said Noah had something on that day too. It ended with you sketching all of us together. I just enjoyed your presence but I woke up and realized you weren’t here 🥲 In the dream you had planned to visit again soon.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!!🩵 happy FriYAY !! I’m so glad your hockey game went well & ya’ll won!! So so proud of you!!🥰 I hope today is a great day!! I love you so insanely much. I’m really missing you a ton right now😭 wearing your jacket brings me so much comfort & peace. Thank you again for letting me bring it home🥺💙 it makes it a bit more bearable being away from you. I pray you get enough rest, I saw you were up at 3AM?? That’s crazy😭 I love you so so so much my partner in crime!! It’s us forever🥰🤍 God knew my heart needed you and I will forever be thankful for that. Everything is better with you. Everything has been better since you🩵 I want to spend the rest of my life learning all the ways to make you feel loved. I love and cherish you always my love🥰

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning 😁💙 you’ve had a very early day lol, I’d be surprised if your family doesn’t get sleep deprived Holleigh.
