It means the world to me that you’d wear my jacket around, I LOVE YOU SO MUCH 🩵💙🩵💙 I’m so thankful for you and I know it’s only by an act of God working through me that I found such a wonderful person online and reached out at such an opportune time 🙃 You are deserving of love from me forever, no matter what comes in our way. I’m incredibly proud of everything you do, from posting Godly messages like the one you posted on instagram today to your works of art which show you make magic :) Thanks for treating me with such love and being so joyful no matter the situation, being around you for the rest of my life will be like living a dream. I miss you so much, but I’m elated to just have you in my life and look forward to every text and call from you. Distance means so little when someone means so much 💙🌹

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my love 🩵 another day passes, meaning we are another day closer to our future together. It’s a wonderful Sunday, I’m going to spend time with the Lord today, and I pray that you are able to find peace in Him for some time today, as I know the cruise can be hectic. Today I look at us and I realize again how proud I am that you were able to burn the ships of your past and trust in me, and more importantly in God to lead you into a relationship with me. The scary prayer you prayed worked out perfectly, I know it must be hard to put that into God’s hands and trust him with it. Thanks for stepping faithfully into my arms babe, I promise to be there for you forever, you beautiful breath of fresh air 💙🌹

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Night my love🩵 I hope hockey went well tonight! You are so talented and amazing at what you do :) I’m proud of you. I hope you sleep well and get enough rest for tomorrow!! It’s another week we get to show Gods glory to others. I’m lucky to love you and get to do life alongside you! You’ve changed my life for the better, added color to my blank canvas. Brought the blue back into my oceans and my skies. You are my sunshine ☀️ I know life with you will be a dream. A reality we get to live together 💙 I love you, we have forever to go🩵💙 always remember, my heart holds you when my arms cannot. You will always be the love I call home

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Goood morning my wife 💙💙 I know I can’t roll over in bed to say good morning to you in person but getting to text you first thing in the morning is the next best thing. I slept well and I’m ready for the day. I pray you have a restful Sunday and you enjoy the day, spending time in God’s presence. He gave me you and I’ll never let go. I love you so much, I’ll spend the rest of my life trying to express it. You are the most important person in my life besides God. Thanks for playing into the pit with me, I loved every second of playing it with you. My face hurt after that night, I couldn’t stop smiling at every little thing we said, from the playful jokes and jokes that had discord server implication, to getting to call you my muffin to say good night 🥰

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love🩵 I hope you slept well and got enough rest!! Happy Saturday!!! Thank you for an amazing night last night. It was truly a dream come true. Watching you play RUIN & hearing you theorize about it was truly awesome. I never thought I’d find someone to share these passions with. Thank you for choosing to love me even through distance. I know some days can be extremely tough, I’m thankful for your unwavering faith and trust in me to do long distance. You are my answered prayer, my miracle. I never knew a love like this existed. You’ve shown me what true, Godly love is. You are my sun on the cloudiest day, my joy in the tough times. What an honor it is to love you and be loved by you🩵🩵 you’re my forever. I want to grow old with you, my bestfriend. I love you forever and always, till death do us part. I hope you have the best day, may the Lord speak through you and use you to shine His light and get his message to those who need it!! You are truly amazing. I’m so proud of you

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Goodnight, sleep whale! 💙 I’m seriously speechless as to how lucky I am to live with you in my life. The fact that you sit there with your full attention when I’m playing FNAF and catching up to you in the lore is something truly special. You sit there engaged and support me, calling me the most adorable names :) Even when I complete some simple games, you smile and spread positivity and I just can’t help but feel so warm inside. You bring a smile to my face in everything you do. I make a little heart in my hands and you do it back every time. I love you Holleigh, with my whole heart, body and soul, and I promise on everything I have that I’ll will never step away from you. God shines through you in everything you do. Get some rest babe, my wife, my love, my soulmate, my dear, whatever name you fancy 🥰 My tail wags for you endlessly 🌹

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!🩵 this was so sweet to wake up to🥺 I would watch you play FNAF & catch up on the lore any day, anytime🥰 you are deserving of love and I’ll spend the rest of my life showing it to you, you are my blessing💙 I cannot believe I have someone to share these passions with. Everyone thought I was weird for liking FNAF, and all these other things, but with you I can embrace them. You took my hand and jumped into the madness with me, wanting to watch all these FNAF Theories and play the games with me. No ones ever wanted to do that, no ones ever wanted to learn and go that far for my interests. I’ve never had someone put that much effort into me besides Jesus. Zac you truly are someone so special and precious to me. Your smile makes my entire day, to hear you talk about your passions and your ideas is so amazing, your Ghostern story is beautifully written. You have so many amazing ideas and I know you’re going to do great things!!! Zac I love you with all that I have, I promise to stay by your side till the end. You’re the one I want and choose to do life beside. God put you in my life for a reason, at the most perfect time. Looking back, I can’t imagine my life without you now🩵 I love you I love you, I love you SO much💙 till death do us part

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: I pray your sweet dreams are coming along my sweetest wife. The best four months of my life, thanks to you. Four months of seeing your precious smile. Four months of waking up to some of the most thoughtful and loving messages I’ve ever gotten. Four months of FNAF, MatPat, and our giggles in the night. Four months with not enough hugging and kissing than desired, but enough to last me a lifetime of waiting for the next time. Four months since stepping into a forever relationship with my Proverbs 31 woman, precious as rubies, even more so… I’ll marry you, as a life without you would be like missing the train to my dreams becoming a reality. Here’s to the rest of our lives. Lives with perfect communication necessary to navigate the bumps in the road. Lives with faith that can move those bumps, no matter how big the mountain. Lives filled with facing and overcoming problems. Lives filled with love, not the kind you fall into, but the kind you cherish and kindle so that you look back upon it and are proud. Lives of bringing life into this world, nourishing and caring for God’s greatest gift. God’s got a life of surprises lined up for us, let’s accept each one with open arms. I love you my love, I adore you and I’ll remind you more than the stars in the sky. I’ll kiss you more than the grains of sand. I’ll hug you until every hint of stress, sadness, and anger leaves your body. My one and only, forever and always. Happy four months 💙🧡❤️

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!!! Happy 4 months!!!🥰 I slept super well praise the Lord!! These have been the best 4 months out of this whole year. Praise be to God for placing you into my life !! Four months of learning, loving, FNAF and so many fun memories with you!!! I’m truly blessed to be with someone so caring, compassionate, loving, thoughtful and Godly. I’ve prayed for you for years and to see it granted was a testimony of Gods goodness and grace! He truly is a good good God!!! I’m forever SO incredibly thankful for you Zac, you’ve shown me what a healthy, Godly love looks like. Something I thought I’d never be able to experience. I love you so so much, my bestfriend, my partner in crime, my lover. Happy 4 months, we have forever to go 🩵🩵🩵

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my gorgeous president!! 💙 I pray you got good sleep for your second day of school. I didn’t get to dream of you last night, but yesterday was a dream just getting to spend time with you and play FNAF while you were drawing. My body decided to wake up at 7:30 again even though I was up late due to hockey last night, so I think I’ll get up soon if I don’t fall back asleep. It’s okay though, maybe God is trying to get us on the same sleep schedule 😌 Today let’s push our burdens over to God, let’s not let stress and worry bother us when we are doing our best. I love you so much, and I know you love me too, you do such a great job expressing it daily. I’m proud to call you my future wife 💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Truly I tell you, I want to be the only one who has to see Holleigh behind the scenes. I want to be the one to mend you when God sends you to parts and service to be rebuilt after the worst. I want to spend my nights recharging you so you can go out there and keep your joyous attitude and change lives, bring others to the Lord. It means the world to me that you’d even consider being vulnerable with me because it shows the ultimate act of trust. Trust that I will support your weak points rather than take advantage of them. On days when that beautiful smile fades and it becomes hard to stay joyous, you don’t have to pretend to smile. No need to drain your battery further, I won’t run away if you aren’t your smiley, positive self all the time. On the worst days I will be around for you to just lay in my arms, no words needing to be said. Romance movies don’t show it, but behind the romance are days of recharging scattered amongst days of hard work. There will be busy times in life and I’ll enjoy those knowing that patience will bring times of tranquility. I feel like this is almost God’s test for us, can we make it through the tough times without even being about to hug each other? I know we can, with someone as strong as you by my side, it will be more than possible. God is here too, I’m always reminded of Ecclesiastes 4:12 (KJV):“And if one prevail against him, two shall withstand him; and a threefold cord is not quickly broken.” That’s us babe, us and God. I love you

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my handsome man!!🩵 I love more!!! Of course!!! I loved it :)) tonight was what we needed after this week!! We definitely should have like a chill night or movie night every weekend if we’re able!! I’m truly lucky God gave me you. You are everything and more I’ve ever prayed for in a man I’ve wanted to be with. You are an answered prayer. I know this week was a bit hectic, but thank you for staying with me even through the business. Thank you for wanting, and taking time to talk through our concerns and the things that bother you. I never knew a love like this existed outside of God. I was lucky enough God sent me someone who loves like Him. I love you Zac, thank you for loving me🩵 you are my greatest adventure! I can’t wait to see where God takes us in life!!! I hope you’re feeling a bit better today!! If not, please maybe go get checked out. Your health is important and being sick isn’t fun :( I care about you, I love you!! I pray today is a wonderful day!! 🥰💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good afternoon my wife ❤️🧡💙 I slept really well and I feel great!! I hope you’ve gotten rest too, yesterday was a long day. Honestly this is reminding me how perfect the timing was to reach out to you and meet you in January. I caught you right before you headed to Auburn, and I know if I reached out now it would have been very hard for you to get time to meet me. I’m so happy I have spent these months knowing you Holleigh, you are so incredibly special. Over 8 months later and I still just sit here smiling, looking through pictures of us, your art, and everything I’ve pinned on my wall, and I’m consumed by adoration for you. I love you so much, and I’m so proud of you, and us for the relationship we’ve built so far. 💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Perspective is everything 😌 Your positive outlook is one of the top things on my list for my wife, but you really do check that list from top to bottom. We are the stars in the night sky, aligned perfectly from the culmination of our pasts until now, I could not be more pleased to be in your company. That picture of you is beautiful, not just because my beautiful wife is in there 🙃 but the backdrop you made is an extension of yourself. It’s poetic in a sense, I look at your stance and at the colors you’ve painted, and I see those colors in you. The bright orange is the first ray of sunshine that finds its way through the stormy clouds, your positivity finding its way amongst the dark sky. The blue is the vast expanse of the sky, while I’m in love with the color in itself, the sky is what fills the empty space amongst the clouds. You fill other people up when they are missing something in their lives, and I’m certain that’s God working through you. The pink and yellow remind me of the feeling I get being around you, and I know others do too. Pink is the love I feel when you do any little thing for me, yellow is the joy that fills me when you even just smile, the flower blooming within me tended and cared for by you. To see my love standing among the backdrop that she created, I see the mascot to a sorority of wonderful women. I’m so incredibly proud of you so far. I’ve said it before that you are enough, but you are more than enough dear, you are what I’ve been praying for, and I’ll marry you. Now I do want to mention that in days of distress and turmoil, that I will promise you to be there for you the most. After everything I’ve just said about you, it’s okay need to recharge on a bad day. You don’t have to be like this 100% of the time around me, I’ll be there to hold you tight in my arms and not let go until you are ready to spread your joy around the world again. There will come a day where you or I will need just that to recuperate, it’s harder since I’m across the country, but God’s got us. I love you and I’m here for you through it all. You’re the one for me forever 🌹 I hope this has been nice to wake up to!! Don’t bother writing a giant response back my love, let this message help you get through your last day until the weekend! 12 more days 😌

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Hey my love, I’ve been reading a bit about the honeymoon phase and I’m seeing some people who claim to still be in it after being together for years. I don’t know if they are telling the truth or if they misunderstand what the phase is, but it does make me sad thinking about if or when ours will end. I just wanted to say that right now I’m infatuated with you, to call and see your face has me on cloud nine every time. Hearing your voice and seeing that friendly smile is a joy I’ll never get tired of. I feel like I’m sailing away on a boat with you, and no matter how rough the waves are, I know I will always be at home by your side. Yeah maybe that obsession will end one day, and I’ll finally be able to do anything without thinking about you the whole time. But I wanted to type this out to promise you to keep on putting effort to make you feel those butterflies and warm feelings as much as I can, forever. I promise to send texts like these, but when we live together, they will probably be in the form of letters to you my love. I promise to spoil you with thoughtful gifts like gift art and plushies, in the future this might look like surprise trips to places of your dreams too. I promise to always tell you how proud of you I am, to support you on your worst days, to tell you how you are the woman of my prayers and dreams. This won’t change, but you’ll be able to rest in my arms when I say these things in the future. I promise to spoil you with little acts of service, i haven’t been able to do that too much because we are so far away from each other, but i look forward to it! And of course our quality time will never leave. I promise to be present with you and enjoy our time together, and I will ALWAYS ask you about your day and never get sick or tired of hearing you tap about it. You are my favorite person, and any time spent with you is a wish come true. I promise to always make an effort to hug, kiss, hold your hand, just giving you all the physical touch you could ever want. Right now I don’t know how I would ever get sick of it haha, but I promise to put an effort into anything to make you smile. Most importantly, I promise to put God and His will for us in the forefront of everything, forever and ever. I don’t know what came over me to type all that, maybe it’s me missing you, maybe it’s reassurance that you never stop feeling the sweet feelings that come with the honeymoon phase, but I know for sure it’s what the person who I will love and cherish forever deserves. I love you Holleigh, forever and ever ❤️🧡💙🌹

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: My love🥹🩵 I know some people stay in that honeymoon phase even throughout years, even decades of being together! I’ve seen countless videos and heard from couples about still being madly in love and obsessed with their partner! I think especially for a biblical relationship it is possible! As long as God comes first & spouses second, God will bless the marriage & love! Reading this genuinely brought tears to my eyes. I’ve re-read this message, your declaration of your love, your promises to continue on even if that does fade. It’s so astonishing and truly so heartfelt. I never imagined a love like this, you love me so intentionally, you put your heart and soul in everything you do, say and act for me; for us. This has truly made the biggest smile come on my face, and my heart grows even more in love with you, which I don’t know was possible. Zac, you have shown 1 Corinthians 13:4-8 love continuously. When I replace the word love with your name, you are in that verse. Your love for me is so great, I never imagined God would see fit to give me someone so precious, so intentional. I promise to continue to show you all the 5 love languages, no matter if we’re old and grey, it brings me countless joy getting to see your smile and hear the excitement in your voice. I will never grow tired or weary hearing about your day and the fun adventures you’ve been on, and all the so cool projects and things you’re getting to do. Zac, you are more than my answered prayer. I’ve prayed and talked to God about you for years now, not knowing it was you I was talking to Him about. He knew, God knew what He was doing when He gave me you. You are the best role model as a Godly man and a Godly relationship, and what true love looks like. Everyone you meet when you’re down here visiting will be astounded by your humility and humbleness. Your selflessness for me and for us. Reading this is just a reminder for why I chose you. I promise to love you with all that I have. Lord willing, I want to be the one to wake up by your side every morning, and come home to each night. You have truly given my life so many wonderful colors, shown me what love looks like and what it can look like as long as we live. I love you so so endlessly my love🩵💙 I won’t ever grow tired of loving you, showering you with love, words of affirmation, gifts, physical touch, quality time or acts of service. I thank my God for you every single day. I love you Zac, you truly are my miracle I’ve been waiting on for🩵 you will always be worth it. I’m so honored God gave me you

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Wanted to quickly say happy 5 month anniversary before going to sleep my love 💙 This year has really gone by so fast looking back on it, but it feels like I’ve known you forever. You will always be more than enough for me, I have no want for a life without you. I will never leave your side, and will fight for us no matter what comes our way. Every day my passion grows for you. I’m so proud to see all that you have accomplished while being in my life, your art, your Biblical posts, your Bible and devotional reading and overall immersion in the word and presence of God, and your thriving sorority through which you make every member’s life better. I am complete in God, but you complement and enhance me. I love you eternally ❤️🧡💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Happy 5 Months to my bestfriend, my confidant, partner in crime, soulmate, my lover, my person. To know you is to love you. Knowing you these past few months has been the greatest adventure. Zac, you are everything and more that I’ve been praying for in a man. You love me so well. I remember when you first reached out to me, you were so inquisitive about me, my life and were curious to what I had been up to. You showed your authentic self from the start, and have stayed true to you ever since I’ve known you. It was definitely that smile, the first time I saw it. I knew I wanted to see it for the rest of my life. You have shown me what love is, healthy love. You have had patience with me when battling my past, when we have any bumps in the road. You ease my worries constantly, never have you given me a reason to doubt or not trust you. I had been praying for you for years, not knowing God had you right where you were supposed to be. You inspire me, you keep me grounded when I need it, offer a listening ear, a gentle smile and your warm laugh. I couldn’t imagine my life with anyone other than you, you are a breath of fresh air. The sunlight on my skin, my flowers in a field, the fire that keeps me warm on a cold night. You’re a love I’d cross oceans for. Zechariah Yurkanin, I will forever be thankful God saw fit to place you into my life. I can’t wait to see all the adventures we get to take on, I love you always and forever 🩵 Happy 5 months my lover. You are proof that God answers prayers 💙💙💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!🩵 Happy Monday! It’s the beginning of the week! Which means a week full of possibilities, ways to show Gods love & spread His word!! I’m so thankful for you Zac. I know we have conversations that aren’t fun sometimes, and I’m really thankful for you that you talk through everything with me and we can get through the tough conversations together. That you actually want to talk about it and through it, and you don’t sweep these things under the rug! I love you so so so much🩵 I’m so thankful and grateful to call you mine, you are so patient, loving, caring, and truly a blessing in my life. I love you Zac, and I’ll love you through the good days & the bad, and through the uncomfortable conversations! I love you so much. Thank you for choosing me & choosing to love me💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning though my love !!! I hope you’ve slept well, I’m sure you were exhausted from the not so relaxing weekend and getting up this morning was probably pretty difficult. We are a team and you are the best teammate I could ask for. What we have is worth every difficult conversation, we have such a deep relationship and it’s only been 5 months. Keep communicating these things with me, every time we finish talking, I always feel a lot better. Sometimes I try not to bother you with those conversations, but every time I finish one I remember how easy you make it to talk to you. I love you eternally, you are a bright star in the dark sky, not only for me, but so many others. It’s funny how you are already Hannah Grace’s outlet to talk about her relationship, you bring wisdom to the table. Have a wonderful day 🙃💙

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love🩵 I’m so glad I got to hang out with you yesterday and la  at night🥰🥰 I’m truly so so thankful for you!! It’s so wild that God knew what He was doing all along, bringing us together. Two people who needed to grow in their faith and their relationship with the Lord before finding each other. I’m in awe of you, we have so many similarities yet we’re still different in our own ways. You compliment me so well, you bring out the joy, love, patience and laughter in me. Ever since meeting you my life has been more colorful and full of love than I’d ever imagine. I love you SO much🩵💙 always and forever 🥰 I hope you have the best day!!

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning :) This was a lovely message to wake up to 🥰 I feel so bonded to you it’s exhilarating, everyday I come something new that draws me closer to you, despite the miles apart. Even watching a simple YouTube video feels like a dream with you by my side. To know for all those years we had such similar interests despite completely different lives. I can’t wait to spoil you for eternity, you deserve every kiss, every flower, and every carefully crafted message. I’m so proud to call such a virtuous woman mine, even now I’m smiling cheek to cheek with coffee laying on my chest in my bed. I’d much rather you be the one lying on my chest, but the Lord has us where he wants us for now. I love you to Alabama and back a million times ❤️🧡💙 Good luck on your pamphlet today, I know it’s due!! Last I saw it looks so good, I can’t wait for you to show me it finalized XOXO I love you I love you I love you I love you I love you I love you !!!!!!!!! 🥰❤️🧡💙 🌹 flower for u!!! 🥀 it died 💔 💐 more flowers for u ❤️

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Alex Warren - Heaven Without You I’m so glad I could make you feel loved, you are the most precious thing in my life so I’ll spend my days expressing that to you :) Same with being seen!! I’ll always make sure you are seen, and not just because you are something gorgeous to look at 😉 I see and hear everything you do and say, sometimes it leads to me reading into things to much, but most of the time I notice every little effort you make in all of your art pieces, the clothes you put on daily, the slightest change in jewelry. I hear your loving words and what’s on your mind, I could listen to you yap for days! Just listened to that song you sent me last night, it’s beautiful resonate with us truly :) Although I know heaven will be so much different than we expect, it certainly feels like you are my heaven. I can’t really imagine a world that gets any better than the one I’m in right now and it’s thanks to you 💙 The only thing better than this is getting to hold you in my arms, but God is working in us, there is reason. I know with Him in our sights before each other, we will be led to the greenest pastures with each other. I love you with all my heart, thanks for being mine ❤️🧡💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Hey happy Gotcha day!! Your Gotcha day every year will be as important to me as it is for you. It was one very important step that eventually led me to you, the most important person in my life. While the Lord was at work, your parents also took you as their own. It’s a beautiful thing that the Lord orchestrated in so many ways, and another reason to praise Him on this day. You will always be my Russian princess, and I thank the Lord that he brought you across the world to grow up in Alabama, it’s a blessing to get to hold you in my arms. я тебя люблю 🇷🇺 🥹❤️🧡💙 Enjoy your gift :)

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my love 💙 It’s more of a good afternoon for you, didn’t sleep great. I appreciate your message so much, I can’t believe I get to wake up to messages like this every day, I’ll forever be thankful. God’s timing was perfect, and my faith has never been stronger with you by my side. Today is going to be a wonderful day, no matter what happens, we can choose to see the light in every day. If nothing else, God gave us the Sun to rise in the sky without fail, and even that is enough reason to praise Him. “Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: But we will remember the name of the LORD our God. They are brought down and fallen: But we are risen, and stand upright.” ‭‭Psalm‬ ‭20:7-8 I love you to the Sun and back my love 💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning love 💙I hope you’ve slept great and you are ready for another week. Just think that when this week is over, we will be one week closer to being able to embrace each other. I’m so blessed to call you my partner in crime. I’m in awe of you, all that you are, and all the memories that we’ve made so far. Isaiah 41:10 (KJV): “Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.” It may seem, even to me, that it is going to be very difficult to go even just a few weeks without each other. Thinking of God’s promise helps, He was there through our worst, and He is still here now. I miss you love, but we got this ❤️🧡💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: I hope your class went well my love!!! I haven’t gone back to sleep, just an early start to the day. Should help me wake up earlier to stay on your sleep schedule too :) I just wanted to remind you that you have complemented me in so many ways, I feel blessed beyond measure and I sincerely thank the Lord for you. No matter how your day goes, I just want you to know that you mean the world to me. I’m proud of you no matter what, your character is to be looked up to, and I know that when things don’t go your way, that you’ve put your love and care into all that you can. You are a blessing to your family, they are lucky to have you come home for fall break. To start a family with you is a dream, you will be the most Godly, attentive mother I could ever pray up, and I get a best friend out of it too. I love you dearly Holleigh, and I choose to love you forever.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: This made me genuinely tear up🥺 I truly don’t know or understand how I got you in my life Zac. Each day I wake up in awe that I have someone as amazing, loving, caring, thoughtful, intentional and so Godly in my life. Since meeting you, you’ve helped make me a better person. You’ve shown me what true love looks like, what intentional, caring love looks like. I never in my mind thought I’d ever get to experience a bit of heaven on earth, and yet you came into my life🩵 Zac I am in awe of everything you’ve done and are able to do. You truly are a God sent miracle and blessing. I love you so much! I cannot wait to see what God has in store for our future!! We have forever to go!!!

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my love, I hope you got rest and you finish your Minecraft cats if time allows it. I’m SO excited to see you finished work. I’m so blessed to have such a talented artist to enjoy spending the rest of time with. And that’s just the tip of iceberg with you, you make me feel loved in ways I have never felt in my whole life. I’m filled with joy always thank you so much my love. ”My foot standeth in an even place: In the congregations will I bless the LORD.“ ‭‭Psalm‬ ‭26‬:‭12‬ ‭KJV‬‬ Reading through some Psalms and this verse reminded me of you getting to go to the concert today :) it also serves as a reminder for me to bless the Lord. I miss you so so much, all I think about is getting to hug and kiss you all the time. Every time I visit you, it genuinely feels like it’s one of the best times of my life. I have so many amazing memories with you, from sharing laughs, embracing each other for hours and hours, and more 🙃. Just a little while longer wife.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love🩵 Happy Wednesday!!! I appreciate you more than words could ever express. You truly are a blessing from the Lord in so many ways. I love each moment I get to spend with you no matter if it’s for a second or for hours. I’m so honored to call you mine and get to do life alongside you💙💙 You’ve changed my life for the better since I met you in January. I’ve found my bestfriend, my confidant, my lover, my partner in crime all in one. I love you so very much, I am missing you like crazy. I had a dream about you last night and I got to be in your arms again🥹 I love you Zac, I hope today is a wonderful day filled with Gods blessings & His love!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: Happy 6 months my best best friend!!!🩵 I cannot believe it’s been 6 months of loving you!!!!🥰🥰🥰 It’s such an honor to have gotten to know you in the beginning of this year. I’ve known you for 10, loved you for 6💙 Zac, you’ve shown me what true Godly love is and I am forever thankful for you. You are the proof that God answers prayers. You are worth every mile between us. Long distance is so easy with you, you make me feel so loved and so valued even from across the country. I didn’t fall in love with you, I walked into love with you, with my eyes wide open, choosing to take every step along the way. I’d chose you, in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds. I’d find you and choose you. I never realize how much you felt like home to me until I found myself thinking about how much I wish you were here with me right now, thinking about how I want to experience every adventure of life I go through with you by my side. The saying “home is whenever I’m with you” has never been more clear to me. You are my home, and I am homesick without you. I love you so much, happy 6 months, we have forever to go! 🩵🩵🥰

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Good morning my dearest 💙 happy six months!!! It has been an incredible six months my love, you’ve made 2024 a year to remember. Getting a fresh start together, loving each other from different worlds, has been what we deserved. Patience has been a big part of this relationship, 21 years you’ve waited for me, and 22 years I’ve waited for you. Even now we count down the days until we get to enjoy each other’s embrace. All of it was and is worth it, you are my first true love and you will be my only love. Thank you for teaching me about love, and what it’s like to live life loved, it’s something I never want to live without again. You’ve taught me not only how to love, but you’ve shown me it so well. My heart swells with joy daily, I’ve become addicted to you, and even after six months I absolutely can’t get enough of you. Learning to be romantic and show you my love has been a pleasure, and you have reciprocated me all the way. You are the masterpiece I have never known existed but always dreamed of. Getting to grow along side you has been the best, and I’m so proud of you every step of the way. My faith in God has never been stronger alongside you and nothing with get in our way as we cultivate a healthy relationship. Thanks for being there for our best romantic moments and our not fun conversations where we grow. 11 days until I come home, I choose love you for eternity, my beautiful Russian blessing 💙🥰

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Under Auburn’s moonlit skies, you dance in blue, Dark eyes shining, like stars breaking through. While I skate on Michigan’s icy, bright stage, Facing battles and rivals, our love turns the page. I’ll think of you with each stride I take, Your strength in my heart, no fear can shake. Miles stretch wide, yet love knows no bounds, As you glide to the music, I skate these grounds. A prayer on my lips, a dream in my sight, Wishing I was there, holding you tight. For every mile, every state we’re apart, God keeps us together, in soul, in heart. So, tonight I play, and you spin with grace, Yet I see your smile, I feel your embrace. Six months gone, but forever to come, My beautiful love, my chosen one.

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: HI my lover, good morning 💙💙💙 I hope you’ve had a great start to your day so far. 2 more days, I’m so unbelievably excited, I really need this trip right now. Thanks you hanging out with me last night, and thank you SO MUCH for the Halloween piece. I love, adore, am obsessed with every piece you draw, I cannot express the gratitude I feel the need to express when you gift me one of those. I want to scoop you up and pepper you with kisses and squeeze you with hugs, anything to show my love for you. I’ll never get used to it, your art is as beautiful as you are. I cannot believe you are real. I love you 💙💙💙

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Holleigh, thanks for those five days, they were absolutely amazing. I’ve never felt more peace at someone’s side. Every second is so enjoyable with you, you are my best friend and lover all in the same and they complement each other like no other. Even in the dull moments, joy fills my heart, I’m ever blessed to have you and I won’t get over that feeling. Thanks for driving all the way from Auburn and picking me up from the airport with food packed for me, I appreciate that so much. I’m thankful for our sweet tooth chemistry and getting to eat your freshly baked cookies and cinnamon rolls. Thanks for making plans for us, but not being overbearing about them. It warmed my heart when you were willing to pass up on the opportunity to dress up together for Halloween just to appease the black cat in me. I can promise you that I will always be more than happy to make memories with you even if it means being a little uncomfortable. Thanks for arranging our costumes and buying my outfit, we looked so good together and it made for a wonderful first Halloween with my soulmate 💙 Thanks for taking me to the Auburn football game and holding my hand while we boiled under the sun. Thanks for spending 25 dollars to watch the Wild Robot with me, it was touching to watch an unconventional family of a robot, a fox, and a bird together and it reminded me of us in a way, from much different backgrounds and across the country from each other. Thanks for watching Spirited Away and Totaro with me, as strange as those movies are, I loved them and loved watching them with you. Thanks for getting us pumpkins so I could carve my first pumpkin, I hope our foxy isn’t rotting away too quickly out there. Next Halloween I know we will carve/ paint even better pumpkins. Thanks for putting up that Christmas tree with me, it’s an honor to have our first tree sit in your living room while we are apart. Thanks for drawing on my arms, your beautiful art marking my skin of our characters makes me so happy. I’m still in awe at your character design of my boy. Thanks for paying for Wendy’s, and shopping for food while thinking of me like the barbecue chicken pizza. Thanks for being open to watching that church message on salvation, even though it was a long one. It’s an important matter to me. Thanks for the most comfortable bed in the world to sleep in, with the most cuddly partner I could dream of, for the hundreds of hugs and kisses shared between us and the parts we can’t text about in here. Thanks for the bath and showers. Thanks for the trip to six flags, paying for my ticket and making for such a memorable night. Thanks for the ride back to the airport and paying for all the gas money. Thanks for all the small moments I couldn’t capture in this text, they all matter to me dearly. Most importantly thanks for choosing to love me across the country, with such passion and thoughtfulness in every little thing. It’s not easy being away from your lover, especially when we know we are going to have to do it for such a long time. I promise to choose to love you until the end, through everything. I am lucky to have you, I appreciate you more than I could ever express. I love you so so much, and every mile this plane travels away from you it burdens my heart. We are strong, and God is with us every step of the way. I can’t wait for our future.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: My love, you don’t have to thank me at all. It’s an honor to get to love you and plan all these things for you and us🩵 Thank YOU for choosing me, all the way from Alabama and making the trips out here to spend time with me. It’s wild to think that someone from across the country could care about me and love me so much to take a plane and visit me. You are a testament of Gods love and a reminder of it every single day. The fruits of the spirit flourish out of you daily. I loved getting to spend time with you this weekend. I really appreciate you dressing up on Halloween and going with me to my sisterhood event, that meant the absolute world to me! I loved getting to go to six flags with you aswell, I’m so lucky to love you and be loved by you Zac. Every second and moment this weekend with you was a true dream. I treasured watching the wild robot, and all the other fun movies we got to! I’m so glad you like to watch movies like that with me, you compliment me in so many ways🩵 Zac you are everything and more I’ve prayed for since I was little, I knew the moment you reached out to me that you were going to be permanent and someone really special in my life. God knew my heart needed you. He placed you into my life at the most perfect time, I wasn’t even looking when you came into my life. You truly are a gift from the lord Zac. I’ll spend the rest of my life trying to show you how much I love you and appreciate you in every way. I cannot wait for our future together, to marry you, make a life with you and see where the Lord takes us. Long distance is hard, but I know it’s all going to be worth it in the long run. We’re fortunate to be able to see each other just about every month, I treasure my time with you even more because it’s limited. I take for granted time with friends all the time because I get to see them 24/7, but God has taught me that time with the ones you love is to treasure and to not take it for granted. I love you Zac, I miss you so much. Thank you for giving me your sweatshirt, it’s like you’re hugging me🥰 I love you always and forever my love.  I can’t wait to marry you, take your last name and see what our future holds. This is just the beginning of our adventure💙 I love you always, we have forever to go

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Your spirit reminds me of a river’s calm, never-ending flow my love. It’s nurturing, life giving, and steady. Just as a river flows gracefully, shaping the landscape with its gentle persistence through erosion, your presence fills my life with peace and strength. Your beauty isn’t just what the world sees, it’s in the way you bring calmness and joy to those who are lucky enough to be near you. When someone gets to know you, it’s hard to not just want to hang by the river that is your soul and be nourished. I’m blessed enough to be able to be by that river permanently, and even looking upon you from a distance is satisfying enough, but the thought of being able to close that distance exhilarates me. My love for you flows as naturally as a river’s path, steady and unwavering, and it only grows deeper with each day you bring your gentle strength and beauty into my life 🏞️

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Goodnight my lover. My beautiful, lush garden. Your vibrant life many experience but few get to hold it so close. Your tender, nurturing spirit isn’t just showcased in the beauty of your smile, but the warmth of your love which you offer so naturally, as a garden nourishes all around it. I apologize for forgetting you’ve got to wake up early tomorrow, I would have said goodnight sooner haha. I appreciate you truly. You give and return love to me so much that I feel like an endless oasis of love waiting to be given to you. It’s a blessing to walk our journey together, not only on this world, but our journey to the next world in Christ. I hope this message finds you well in the morning. Go ahead and give me a call before you have company in your presence, I’d love nothing more than to wake up to your smile first thing in the morning, it’s like the sweet sound of the birds chirping in the morning. I hold onto the hope that I’ll be reunited with my lover soon enough. Thank you for choosing me, I’d choose you in any universe and time.

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin🩵 this was so sweet to wake up to this morning, and I’m so happy I got to call you before the game💙💙 I hope you’re sleeping well and getting rest !! You are everything and more I’ve ever prayed for. God truly knew what He was doing when he place you into my life. You are the epitome of 1 Corinthians 13:4-8. You show love so well and Godly. You have pushed me towards God and helped strengthen and encourage my relationship with the Lord. I am so proud of you and everything you’re doing and accomplishing! From juggling college, hockey, your internship and still finding time to talk and spend time with me has truly meant the world to me. I never know if find someone who was so intentional with their time and truly wanted to put aside that time to talk and be with me. I love you so so much!🩵 I hope today is the best day!!!

messages.author: Holleigh
messages.text: G’Mornin my love!!🩵 happy Monday!!! I hope you are sleeping well and are getting rest! I loved getting to hang with you yesterday and last night!! I’m truly super blessed to call you mine. You are so loving, caring, kind, generous, thoughtful, intentional and just all around the absolute BEST🤍 Zac you are a blessing in every way. You have been so loving and patient with me as I experience this relationship and this love for the first time. In my moments of weakness you give me a hand to help me up. You’ve been my rock, my confidant and my bestest friend. You’ve shown me a love like no other, one I didn’t know existed. I had given up on finding a Godly love after searching so long, but it was once I stopped looking that the Lord deemed we were ready and led us to cross paths. Meeting you was the BEST thing this year. You have stayed your authentic self and haven’t tried to be different or act different, you are truthful and authentic. You are the sun in my days, radiant and bright. The sun can get into the small crevices in any sidewalk, and cast out any and every darkness. You have been my light throughout this year, a beacon of joy and love not only for me but for everyone you encounter. I love you so much, and I will forever thank God for seeing me fit to give you to me to call my partner, lover and bestfriend. You are the one I know God blessed me with to spend the rest of my life with. I love you Zac, always and forever 🩵🩵 you are my answered prayer in EVERY way

messages.author: Zac
messages.text: Thank you so much for the lovely message to wake up to my love 💙 It means so incredibly much that you would put in the effort to type it out. Ever since meeting you I’ve been touched by the effort and love you’ve shown me. Despite being 1700 miles from you, you consistently show God’s love in my life, something I’ve been lacking from others. Thank you so much, you’ve restored hope with your care, patience, and kindness. I’ll cherish you until the end of time. Have a wonderful start to your week today, I hope you’ve gotten the rest you need to succeed. I love you more than anything my love 💙
